title: ANYI BU UMU NKE CHINEKE NNA (WE ARE THE CHILDREN OF GOD THE FATHER)
author: Traditional Igbo liturgical chant

sections.title: Chorus
content: O Chinecke Nna, o nara Onyinye
O mee ka ezi na ulo obula dim ma

sections.title: Verse 1
content: Anyi bu umu nke Chineke Nna

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Anyi bu ndi enweghi ike obula
Belu soso Gi bu Chineke Nna

sections.title: Verse 3
content: Maka ihi mmehie nke anyi mere

sections.title: Verse 4
content: Anyi bu umu nke Chineke Nna

source: Not listed on hymnary.org (regional Igbo liturgical hymn; verify with local sources)
